title: Trudeau facing cold reality after lonely week on world stage
selftext:
[https://www.bbc.com/news/in-pictures-66885924](https://www.bbc.com/news/in-pictures-66885924)

**This week in New York, as he listened to questions from reporters, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's reliable smile began to fade.**
